div.head: 大便不固
div.div: major relief not firmly controlled; incontinence of stools

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: major relief not firmly controlled; incontinence of stools

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with yi shi 遺屎 , fecal incontinence. Shi yi de xiao fang 世醫得效方 11: 治瘡疹漸黑， 面陷，大便不固 , “To cure sores and papules gradually assuming a dark color, when the face is sunken in, and [patients are] incontinent of stools ”.
